titleStmt.title: A relation containing the manner of the solemnities at the election and coronation of Ferdinand the Emperour, in Francford the 30. of August last past, 1619 With other occurrences in Bohemia, and diuers parts of Germany, for three moneths last past.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Elde] for Robert Mylbourne, and are to be solde at the great south-dore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
